title: Generate non-placeholder report.html for MVP runs
scope: Generate a minimal but truthful HTML report for each bundle run.
Report must include: counts, confidence summary, and known gaps/failure reasons.
Report must link to diagnostics artifacts when present.
acceptance: report.html is not the placeholder scaffold for real runs.
report.html contains counts for players/ball (when present) and a confidence/gaps section.
report.json and report.html are consistent and deterministic.

deliverables.title: Report generator
acceptance: HTML report generator produces deterministic output from report.json + diagnostics.
CLI writes report.html for run bundles.

subtasks.title: Implement minimal HTML report generator and wire into runner.
done_when: html_report.py exists and renders deterministic HTML.
Runner writes report.html for non-placeholder runs.
